Text:
If you can't download you can add the torrent and download the file from:

Okay, now I'm confused.  Is all this zeitgeist stuff about a social/political/economic movement (see the wikipedia entry for 'zeitgeist movement') or about the film that claims Jesus never existed???  Or maybe these two are somehow all the same thing?
